   19: %%
   20: -module(prof_bench_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   23: 
   24: %% Test server framework exports
   25: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   26: 
   27: -export([overhead/1]).
   28: 
   29: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: %%% Test suites
   31: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
   32: 
   33: 
   34: suite() ->
   35:     [{timetrap,{minutes,30}}].
   36: 
   37: all() ->
   38:     [overhead].
   39: 
   40: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   41:     case whereis(cover_server) of
   42:         undefined ->
   43:             application:ensure_all_started(os_mon),
   44:             Free = disk_free(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)),
   45:             if
   46:                 Free >= 16_000_000 ->
   47:                     %% The size of the log files is about 4 Gb.
   48:                     %% The disk has at least 4 times that amount free.
   49:                     Config;
   50:                 true ->
   51:                     %% There might not be sufficient disk space free.
   52:                     io:format("Free disk space: ~p Kb\n", [Free]),
   53:                     {skip, "Insufficient free disk space"}
   54:             end;
   55:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
   56:             {skip, "Cover is running"}
   57:     end.
   58: 
   59: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   60:     LogFile = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "fprof.trace"),
   61:     file:delete(LogFile),
   62:     ok.
   63: 
   64: %% Return amount disk space free in Kbs for the disk that Path
   65: %% is located on.
   66: disk_free(Path) ->
   67:     Data = disksup:get_disk_data(),
   68: 
   69:     %% What partitions could Data be mounted on?
   70:     Partitions =
   71:         [D || {P, _Tot, _Perc}=D <- Data,
   72:          lists:prefix(filename:nativename(P), filename:nativename(Path))],
   73: 
   74:     %% Sorting in descending order places the partition with the most specific
   75:     %% path first.
   76:     case lists:sort(fun erlang:'>='/2, Partitions) of
   77:         [{_,Tot, Perc} | _] -> round(Tot * (1-(Perc/100)));
   78:         [] -> error
   79:     end.
   80: 
   81: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
   82: 
   83: %% ct:run_test([{suite, prof_bench_SUITE}]).
   84: overhead(Config) ->
   85:     LogFile = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "fprof.trace"),
   86:     SofsCopy = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), "sofs_copy.erl"),
   87:     TC = fun() -> compile:file(SofsCopy, [binary]) end,
   88:     _Warmup = timer:tc(TC),
   89: 
   90:     {NormTime,{ok, sofs_copy, _}} = timer:tc(TC),
   91:     {FProfTime,{ok,sofs_copy,_}} = fprof:apply(timer, tc, [TC], [{file, LogFile}]),
   92:     ct:pal("FProf: ~p Norm: ~p Ratio: ~p",[FProfTime, NormTime, NormTime / FProfTime * 100]),
   93:     {ok,{EProfTime,{ok,sofs_copy,_}}} = eprof:profile([], timer, tc, [TC]),
   94:     ct:pal("EProf: ~p Norm: ~p Ratio: ~p",[EProfTime, NormTime, NormTime / EProfTime * 100]),
   95:     {CProfTime,{ok,sofs_copy,_}} = cprof_apply(timer, tc, [TC]),
   96:     ct:pal("CProf: ~p Norm: ~p Ratio: ~p",[CProfTime, NormTime, NormTime / CProfTime * 100]),
   97:     {CoverTime,{ok,sofs_copy,_}} = cover_apply(timer, tc, [TC]),
   98:     ct:pal("Cover: ~p Norm: ~p Ratio: ~p",[CoverTime, NormTime, NormTime / CoverTime * 100]),
   99: 
  100:     ct_event:notify(#event{name = benchmark_data,
  101:                            data = [{name, fprof_overhead},
  102:                                    {value, NormTime / FProfTime * 100}]}),
  103:     ct_event:notify(#event{name = benchmark_data,
  104:                            data = [{name, eprof_overhead},
  105:                                    {value, NormTime / EProfTime * 100}]}),
  106:     ct_event:notify(#event{name = benchmark_data,
  107:                            data = [{name, cprof_overhead},
  108:                                    {value, NormTime / CProfTime * 100}]}),
  109:     ct_event:notify(#event{name = benchmark_data,
  110:                            data = [{name, cover_overhead},
  111:                                    {value, NormTime / CoverTime * 100}]}).
  112: 
  113: cprof_apply(M, F, A) ->
  114:     cprof:start(),
  115:     Res = apply(M, F, A),
  116:     cprof:stop(),
  117:     Res.
  118: 
  119: cover_apply(M, F, A) ->
  120:     cover:start(),
  121:     catch cover:local_only(),
  122:     Modules = modules(),
  123:     [code:unstick_mod(Mod) || Mod <- Modules],
  124:     cover:compile_beam(Modules),
  125:     [code:stick_mod(Mod) || Mod <- Modules],
  126:     Res = apply(M, F, A),
  127:     cover:stop(),
  128:     Res.
  129: 
  130: modules() ->
  131:     application:load(compiler),
  132:     {ok, CompilerModules} = application:get_key(compiler, modules),
  133:     %% Only cover compile a subset of the stdlib modules
  134:     StdlibModules = [erl_parse, erl_expand_records, erl_lint, gb_trees, gb_sets, sofs,
  135:                      beam_lib, dict, epp, erl_anno, erl_bits,
  136:                      orddict, ordsets, sets, string, unicode, unicode_util],
  137:     CompilerModules ++ StdlibModules.
